languages.text: "Он не в себе и вряд ли вернет рассудок. Я не вижу смысла судить сумасшедшего — предлагаю просто забрать опись и уйти".
"He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."
languages.original_text: "Он не в себе и вряд ли вернет рассудок. Я не вижу смысла судить сумасшедшего — предлагаю просто забрать опись и уйти".

traits.locale_text: "He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."
"He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."

"He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."

languages.text: «Ha perdido la cabeza y no es probable que la recupere. No tiene sentido juzgar a un loco. Sugiero que nos limitemos a recoger el inventario y nos marchemos».
languages.original_text: "He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."

traits.locale_text: «Ha perdido la cabeza y no es probable que la recupere. No tiene sentido juzgar a un loco. Sugiero que nos limitemos a recoger el inventario y nos marchemos».

languages.text: “他已经疯了，恐怕没法恢复正常。给疯子定罪恐怕也没什么意义，我建议你直接拿着清单走人。”
languages.original_text: "He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."

traits.locale_text: “他已经疯了，恐怕没法恢复正常。给疯子定罪恐怕也没什么意义，我建议你直接拿着清单走人。”

languages.text: 「彼は正気を失っている。回復しないだろう。頭のおかしいやつを批難してもしかたない。インベントリを回収して、とっとと出て行った方がいい」
languages.original_text: "He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は正気を失っている。回復しないだろう。頭のおかしいやつを批難してもしかたない。インベントリを回収して、とっとと出て行った方がいい」

languages.text: « Il a perdu l'esprit, et il est peu probable qu'il revienne à la raison. Il ne servirait à rien de juger un malade mental. Contentons-nous de récupérer l'inventaire et partons. »
languages.original_text: "He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."

traits.locale_text: « Il a perdu l'esprit, et il est peu probable qu'il revienne à la raison. Il ne servirait à rien de juger un malade mental. Contentons-nous de récupérer l'inventaire et partons. »

languages.text: "Aklını yitirmiş ve düzelmesi de pek olası değil. Bir deliyi yargılamanın anlamı yok. Envanteri alıp gitmeyi öneriyorum."
languages.original_text: "He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."

traits.locale_text: "Aklını yitirmiş ve düzelmesi de pek olası değil. Bir deliyi yargılamanın anlamı yok. Envanteri alıp gitmeyi öneriyorum."

languages.text: "Er hat den Verstand verloren und wird ihn wohl nicht zurückerlangen. Ich sehe keinen Grund, einen Wahnsinnigen zu verurteilen. Lasst uns einfach den Inventurbericht nehmen und verschwinden."
languages.original_text: "He has lost his mind and is unlikely to recover it. I see no point in judging a madman. I suggest simply collecting the inventory and leaving."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat den Verstand verloren und wird ihn wohl nicht zurückerlangen. Ich sehe keinen Grund, einen Wahnsinnigen zu verurteilen. Lasst uns einfach den Inventurbericht nehmen und verschwinden."
